content:
I heard about cryptocurrency
I invest money to a altcoins or shit coins hoping for it to pump up
loss all my first investment
Study the chart movement
still not working because of the volatility of the market
feeling frustrated
join to a telegram or discord group where people send signals but still working, lost another investment
Heard from expert and successful trader that I need a mentor and I think its good
Hello, the above details are stating how I feel after I lost money investing in cryptocurrency
I am going to give you a task, Pretend that we are talking personally about cryptocurrency and you are successful in these field, and your motive is to get me sign on to Blockchain Accelerator 2.0, where there will be a 1 on 1 Dynamic Coaching program provides invaluable insight into the market and helps investors get higher returns from their investments in cryptocurrency. 
How would you approach me through an email that can hook me so good to jump in to Blockchain Accelerator 2.0 dynamic coaching. Put all your response to me via an email.
